official-title.#text:
To amend the Illegal Immigration Reform and Immigrant
		  Responsibility Act of 1996 (8 U.S.C. 1324a note) to make the E-Verify Program
		  permanent and mandatory, and to provide for certain changes to procedures for
		  participants in the Program.
